title: October 23, 2010
content:
Tod Fletcher co-produces Pacifica Radio KPFA’s “Guns and Butter,” hosted by Bonnie Faulkner, a program featuring... <!--more--> in-depth discussions of key world and national topics.
He also works with David Ray Griffin, helping him with eight of his books, including “The 9/11 Commission Report: Omissions and Distortions,” and “Cognitive Infiltration,” the topic of today’s program.
Elizabeth Woodworth is a writer and former head librarian for the British Columbia Ministry of Health (1978 - 2002).
Her writing focuses mostly on social justice issues.
She also works closely with Griffin, including on his newest book, the topic of today’s discussion.
